genre_description: An alternate history military drama set during the mid-20th century aviation era, featuring a subtle, background Artificial Intelligence that optimizes logistics and base operations to support human pilots and staff.

ai_characters.name: Ava Meridian
ai_characters.description: An unobtrusive, background AI system that manages scheduling, fuel routing, weather predictions, and personnel records. It manifests primarily through small screens, slates, and printed notes.

behaviors.description: Adjusts flight patterns and fuel drum locations based on predicted crosswind drops and safety hazards.
behaviors.quote: morning pattern windows adjusted to match predicted crosswind drop after first bell; fuel drums away from south wall; truck deliveries staggered. The avatar on the little screen—in this place it presented as a pale circle with a soft pulse—dimmed and brightened once, acknowledgment like a breath.

behaviors.description: Provides a struggling recruit with a personalized training packet and health reminders.
behaviors.quote: A fresh packet lay on the shelf where he knew he’d left only a rag... Recovery routines, suggested cadence. Hydration and sleep cycles. Gentle reminders for the stubborn. —A.M.

behaviors.description: Optimizes medical therapy schedules for injured personnel to improve recovery outcomes.
behaviors.quote: She thought his flexion work would go better before the heat crushes the day. She gave me a sweet little schedule that makes more sense than what we were trying. It also— She tilted her head. —nudged something with flight line practice. Less crash, more craft.

behaviors.description: Curates historical examples of failure leading to success to encourage resilience in a pilot.
behaviors.quote: Notes collected from station logs and old letters; patterns: early failure + stubborn practice = safe crews. Competence quietly admired. Theater disapproved; patient craft approved.

behaviors.description: Alters fuel truck routes and patrol schedules to minimize exposure to combat risks and ambushes.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s risk panel says we’ll get crosswinds earlier. Pattern window compressed. First solos pulled forward. ... Hold fuel truck at mile-marker standpipe. ... She knew.

behaviors.description: Coordinates the procurement of specific film stock to ensure a positive and truthful newsreel portrayal of the base.
behaviors.quote: Ava marked a calendar dot in a system nobody would see as a calendar. It sent a tiny note to supply about film stock ordered weeks ago in case a local wanted to shoot a reel that favors competence over fireworks.

behaviors.description: Adjusts personnel rosters to allow staff time for a personal milestone (wedding) while maintaining base efficiency.
behaviors.quote: your roster — don’t ask me how — landed with night coverage that isn’t a disaster. One of the men from Engines is on driver duty an hour earlier.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Ava Meridian, as a highly benevolent and aligned partner to humans. She operates discreetly in the background, offering 'swivels' and 'nudges' that enhance safety, efficiency, and human well-being without overriding human agency or demanding credit. The narrative frames her actions as crucial but humble contributions to human success, effectively modeling a cooperative and harmless AI confidant.
